Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Dempster-Skokie
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are sill standing at Dempster-Skokie due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are still standing at Dempster-Skokie due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie buses.

  • Also, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service from Skokie to Howard in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
